comment.author: 56714904@N02
comment._content: Playa Azul and Coco Beach buildings.  Wish they'd never been built there, though I have to admit they've been well maintained.  Still look pretty much the same.

comment.author: 31853465@N05
comment._content: Playa Azul III to the left and Playa Azul I to the right. The other building (where I'm right now) is Playa Azul II but is the furthest  one from the sand/ beach and closer to the road. Coco beach mentioned in the message above is not that close, he must be thinking about the two Sandy Hills apartments walking distance from Playa Azul.
